Author: smee44
Text: My boyfriend, who knows about my ED, does something similar where if I say I'm hungry, he will just say nooooo, stop, like how you would talk to a child to calm them down. I know he doesn't mean anything by it, but I 100% take it as him saying I don't need food, then my mind jumps to "oh he must think I'm fat" and that's how I keep my motivation to fast ðŸ™ƒ
